Devilcat rallies his forces to the attack: "Gatara!  You and I will 
work on taking that shield down!  Noir, Riekan, Fury, pick a target 
and terminate it!"  Riekan and Fury race in under cover of their 
cloaking devices.  

Devilcat batters at the shield with laser and subspace fire, while 
Gatara charges her massive concussion cannon - capable of putting a 
huge hole in the side of a battlecruiser.  Five seconds pass before 
the weapon is ready, then with a thunderous roar a ball of 
concentrated energy erupts from the barrel and explodes against the 
shields.  What with all the other weapons fire hitting that target, 
the Maximal base isn't likely to HAVE shields anymore by he time 
Gatara's strongest weapon recharges - a good five minutes down the 
road.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> Hydras and the Predacons fire strikes the shields of the might 
Maximal base. Although the shield could be brought down, they stood 
strong for now.
